name: MIGA
description: MIGA — Make Iran Great Again. The first smart Jetton on TON with embedded Smart Transfer Guard™. A token of legacy, peace, and rebirth.
features: Smart Transfer Guard™ (prevents transfers to incompatible addresses, enhancing user security)
Admin Lock (irreversible; the owner can renounce control forever)
Symbolic Token — Griffin, Olive Branch, and Cyrus Cylinder
